title: English at Work. - Eps. 16-18.
creator_credit: SBS-TV, Diane Sundin, Mandy Smith and Ray Quint
brief_description: In episode 16 information is given on the workers’ rehabilitation program, as well as helpful advice on activities people can perform at home to alleviate repetitive strain injury. Episode 17 stresses the importance of effective occupational health and safety procedures in the workplace. And in “Solving problems at work”, examples are dramatised on how best to facilitate discussion between employees and employers.
